text: Following are the results of the 1950 Soviet First League football championship. FC VMS Moscow won the championship. ==Final standings== ==Relegation play-off== To the play-off qualified the champion of the 1950 Football Championship of the Ukrainian SSR and the worst Ukrainian team of masters of the 1950 Soviet Class B. |} ==See also== * 1950 Soviet Class A * 1950 Soviet Cup ==References== * 1950 at rsssf.com * 1950 Ukrainian championship at "Luhansk Our Football" (in Russian) 1950 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1950 Soviet Class B
